src:
Ucapkan Selamat ke Iwan Bule, KPSN Tetap Akan Kritis
04 Nov 2019, 00:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019), telah melahirkan pengurus baru. Dalam empat tahun kedepan, federasi sepak bola di Indonesia itu akan dipimpin oleh Mochamad Iriawan.
Terpilihnya Iwan Bule, sapaan akrab Mochamad Iriawan, sebagai ketua umum (ketum) PSSI mendapat perhatian dari Ketua Komite Perubahan Sepak Bola Nasional (KPSN), Suhendra Hadikuntono. Dia pun berharap agar Iwan Bule bisa komit dengan janji-janjinya untuk memajukan sepak bola Indonesia.
"Saya mengucapkan selamat kepada Mas Iwan. Kami respek, dalam arti mengapresiasi. Kami berharap visi dan misi yang sudah dicanangkan sebelumnya bisa dijalankan ke depannya," ujar Suhendra di Jakarta, Minggu (3/11).
Dalam menjalankan roda organisasi PSSI, Iwan Bule akan didampingi oleh dua wakilnya yaitu Cucu Soemantri dan Iwan Budianto. Selain itu juga oleh 12 anggota komite eksekutif (exco) terpilih yakni Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Endri Erawan, Haruna Soemitro, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Hasani Abdul Gani, Yunus Nusi, dan Vivin Cahyani.

text:
Congratulations to Iwan Bule, KPSN Will Still Be Critical
Nov 04 2019, 12:55 a.m. by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/2/2019), has given birth to a new management. In the next four years, the football federation in Indonesia will be led by Mochamad Iriawan.
The election of Iwan Bule, Mochamad Iriawan's nickname, as PSSI's general chairperson received attention from the Chairman of the National Football Change Committee (KPSN), Suhendra Hadikuntono. He also hopes that Iwan Bule can commit to his promises to advance Indonesian football.
"I congratulate Mas Iwan. We respect, in the sense of appreciating. We hope that the vision and mission that has been announced previously can be carried out in the future," Suhendra said in Jakarta, Sunday (3/11).
In running the PSSI organization, Iwan Bule will be accompanied by two representatives, namely Cucu Soemantri and Iwan Budianto. Also selected by 12 executive committee members (exco) namely Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Endri Erawan, Haruna Soemitro, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Hasani Abdul Gani, Yunus Nusi, and Vivin Cahyani.
